title: 94/463/EC: Commission Decision of 12 July 1994 amending Decision 86/414/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Argentina approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 July 1994 amending Decision 86/414/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Argentina approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community (Text with EEA relevance) (94/463/EC)
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 86/414/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 July 1994.
For the Commission
René STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(3) OJ No L 237, 23. 8. 1986, p. 36.
(4) OJ No L 291, 25. 11. 1993, p. 17.
